display.name: Dungeon Chain
display.description: Dungeon Chain is a permissioned gaming blockchain designed to enhance the Cosmos Ecosystem and onboard non-crypto users into the crypto space. Leveraging the Cosmos Hub's shared security validator set, it will be one of the first permissionless chains launched using the Forge framework on Cosmos.  Created by Crypto Dungeon—a Cosmos Ecosystem validator and game developer—Dungeon Chain aims to promote interchain collaboration and support the growth of the Cosmos community.
